mapper.insert: insert into wg_disclosure_info( applicant_sign,id_name,corporate_sign, occupation,id_number,legal_representative, address,phone_number,email, postal_code,legal_representative_s,organization_name, organization_name_s,organization_number,government_information, mode,carrier,use_type, information_use,remission_type,signature_applicant ) values( #{applicant_sign},#{id_name},#{corporate_sign}, #{occupation},#{id_number},#{legal_representative}, #{address},#{phone_number},#{email}, #{postal_code},#{legal_representative_s},#{organization_name}, #{organization_name_s},#{organization_number},#{government_information}, #{mode},#{carrier},#{use_type}, #{information_use},#{remission_type},#{signature_applicant} )
